abstract: United Nations, struggling to keep up with the spread of the Ebola virus in specific localities and its decline in others, is changing battle tactics; UN's Mission for Ebola Emergency Response is moving away from building large treatment centers and is instead calling for smaller and more mobile units that can make greater use of local trained healthworkers.
lead_paragraph: The organization has struggled to keep up with the spread and decline of the disease in specific localities.

headline.main: U.N. Seeks a More Nimble Response to Ebola in Africa
